sqlMap.update: update pano_order set STATUS=#STATUS# where ORDER_NUM=#ORDER_NUM#
sqlMap.select: SELECT pano_order.ORDER_NUM, pano_order.ORDER_TIME, pano_order.`STATUS`, pano_order.TOTAL_PRICE, pano_order.ADDRESS_SN, pano_order.USER_SN, pano_order.SN FROM pano_order INNER JOIN pano_order_item ON pano_order_item.ORDER_SN = pano_order.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_order_item.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_house_package.SN where pano_project_house_package.SN=#house_package_sn#
SELECT pano_skin.SN as SN, pano_skin.`NAME`, pano_skin.IMG_SN FROM pano_skin

SELECT pano_project_style.`NAME` AS style_name, pano_project_house.`NAME` AS house_name, pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_PRICE AS package_price, pano_project_house_package.DISCOUNT_PRICE AS package_discount_price, pano_project_package.SN AS package_sn, pano_project_package.`NAME` AS package_name, pano_project_package.IMG_SN AS package_img_sn, pano_project_house_package.SN AS house_package_sn FROM pano_project_style INNER JOIN pano_project_house_style ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_house_style.STYLE_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house ON pano_project_house_style.HOUSE_SN = pano_project_house.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_house_package.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = pano_project_house_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package ON pano_project_package.SN = pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN INNER JOIN pano_order_item ON pano_order_item.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_house_package.SN INNER JOIN pano_order ON pano_order_item.ORDER_SN = pano_order.SN where pano_order.USER_SN=#USER_SN# and pano_order.ORDER_NUM=#ORDER_NUM#
SELECT pano_order.SN FROM pano_order where pano_order.ORDER_NUM=#ORDER_NUM#
SELECT pano_project_house_package.SN FROM pano_project_house_package where pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN=#package_sn#
SELECT pano_user_receive_address.SN FROM pano_user_receive_address where pano_user_receive_address.USER_SN=#user_sn# and pano_user_receive_address.`DEFAULT`=1

SELECT pano_project_package_product.PRODUCT_SN FROM pano_project_package INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_package.SN = pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package_type ON pano_project_package_type.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_house_package.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package_product ON pano_project_package_product.PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = pano_project_package_type.SN where pano_project_package.SN=#package_sn#
SELECT pano_order_shopcart.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN FROM pano_order_shopcart where pano_order_shopcart.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN=#package_sn#

SELECT pano_product.`NAME`, pano_product.SN as product_sn, pano_product.WIDE, pano_product.LENGTH, pano_product.HEIGHT, pano_product.BRAND, pano_product.SUMMARY, pano_product.FULL_IMG_SN as fullImgSn FROM pano_project_package_type INNER JOIN pano_project_package_product ON pano_project_package_product.PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = pano_project_package_type.SN INNER JOIN pano_product ON pano_project_package_product.PRODUCT_SN = pano_product.SN where pano_project_package_type.SN=#packageType_sn#

SELECT pano_product.`NAME`, pano_product.LENGTH, pano_product.WIDE, pano_product.HEIGHT, pano_product.COLOR, pano_product.FULL_IMG_SN as fullImgSn, pano_product.SN as product_sn, pano_product.PRICE, pano_product.`STATUS`, pano_product.discount_price, pano_product.STYLE_SN as styleSn FROM pano_project_package_type INNER JOIN pano_project_package_product ON pano_project_package_product.PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = pano_project_package_type.SN INNER JOIN pano_product ON pano_project_package_product.PRODUCT_SN = pano_product.SN where pano_project_package_type.SN=#packageType_sn#

SELECT pano_project_style.`NAME` as style_name, pano_project_house.`NAME` as house_name, pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_PRICE as package_price, pano_project_house_package.DISCOUNT_PRICE as package_discount_price, pano_project_package.SN as package_sn, pano_project_package.`NAME` as package_name, pano_project_package.IMG_SN as package_img_sn, pano_project_house_package.SN as house_package_sn FROM pano_project_style INNER JOIN pano_project_house_style ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_house_style.STYLE_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house ON pano_project_house_style.HOUSE_SN = pano_project_house.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_house_package.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = pano_project_house_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package ON pano_project_package.SN = pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN where pano_project_house_package.SN=#house_package_sn#

SELECT pano_project_style.`NAME` as style_name, pano_project_house.`NAME` as house_name, pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_PRICE as package_price, pano_project_house_package.DISCOUNT_PRICE as package_discount_price, pano_project_package.SN as package_sn, pano_project_package.`NAME` as package_name, pano_project_package.IMG_SN as package_img_sn, pano_project_house_package.SN as house_package_sn FROM pano_project_style INNER JOIN pano_project_house_style ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_house_style.STYLE_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house ON pano_project_house_style.HOUSE_SN = pano_project_house.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_house_package.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = pano_project_house_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package ON pano_project_package.SN = pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN INNER JOIN pano_order_shopcart ON pano_order_shopcart.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_house_package.SN where pano_order_shopcart.USER_SN=#user_sn#;
SELECT pano_ad.IMG_SN, pano_ad.LINK FROM pano_ad where project_sn = #PROJECT_SN#

SELECT project.`NAME` AS project_name, baseStyle.`NAME` AS NAME, houseStyle.IMG_SN AS img_sn, baseStyle.IMG_SN AS style_sn, projectStyle.PROJECT_SN AS project_sn, projectStyle.SN AS id, houseStyle.start_price AS start_price, houseStyle.end_price AS end_price FROM pano_project_style projectStyle INNER JOIN pano_project_base_style baseStyle ON baseStyle.sn = projectStyle.style_sn INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(package_price) AS start_price, SUM(package_price)AS end_price, _houseStyle.style_sn, _houseStyle.img_sn, _houseStyle.house_sn, _houseStyle.project_sn FROM pano_project_house_style _houseStyle LEFT JOIN pano_project_house_package package ON package.house_style_sn = _houseStyle.sn INNER JOIN pano_project_style _proj_style ON _proj_style.SN = _houseStyle.STYLE_SN WHERE _houseStyle.PROJECT_SN = #project_sn# GROUP BY _proj_style.SN ) AS houseStyle ON houseStyle.style_sn = projectStyle.sn INNER JOIN pano_project_house house ON house.sn = houseStyle.house_sn INNER JOIN pano_project project ON project.sn = houseStyle.project_sn WHERE project.SN=#project_sn# AND project.publish=1

SELECT pano_project_label.SN as id, pano_project_label.NAME, pano_project_label.TYPE, pano_project_label.STYLE_SN, pano_project_label.ADDER_SN, pano_project_label.ADDER_NAME, pano_project_label.ADD_TIME, pano_project_label.UPDATER_SN, pano_project_label.UPDATER_NAME, pano_project_label.UPDATE_TIME FROM pano_project_style INNER JOIN pano_project_label ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_label.STYLE_SN where pano_project_label.STYLE_SN=#id#

SELECT pano_project.SN, pano_project.`NAME`, pano_project.PROVINCE, pano_project.CITY, pano_project.AREA FROM pano_project where pano_project.PROVINCE=#PROVINCE# and pano_project.CITY=#CITY# and pano_project.AREA=#AREA#

SELECT pano_project.SN, pano_project.`NAME`, pano_project.PROVINCE, pano_project.CITY, pano_project.AREA FROM pano_project where pano_project.PROVINCE=#PROVINCE# and pano_project.CITY=#CITY# and pano_project.AREA=#AREA# and pano_project.`NAME`=#NAME#

SELECT pano_project_house.SN, pano_project_house.`NAME`, pano_project_house.IMG_SN, pano_project_style.PROJECT_SN FROM pano_project_house_style INNER JOIN pano_project_style ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_house_style.STYLE_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house ON pano_project_house_style.HOUSE_SN = pano_project_house.SN where pano_project_style.SN=#style_sn#
select pano_project.SN, pano_project.`NAME`, pano_project.PROVINCE, pano_project.CITY, pano_project.AREA FROM pano_project

SELECT pano_project_package.SN, pano_project_package.`NAME`, pano_project_package.IMG_SN FROM pano_project_house_style INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_house_package.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = pano_project_house_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house ON pano_project_house_style.HOUSE_SN = pano_project_house.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_style ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_house_style.STYLE_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package ON pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_package.SN where pano_project_style.SN=#style_sn#

SELECT pano_project_space.SN, pano_project_space.`NAME`, pano_project_space.HOUSE_SN FROM pano_project_house INNER JOIN pano_project_space ON pano_project_house.SN = pano_project_space.HOUSE_SN where pano_project_space.HOUSE_SN=#house_sn#

SELECT pano_project.`NAME`, pano_project.SN, pano_project.PROVINCE, pano_project.CITY, pano_project.AREA FROM pano_project_house_style INNER JOIN pano_project ON pano_project.SN = pano_project_house_style.PROJECT_SN INNER JOIN pano_project_style ON pano_project_style.SN = pano_project_house_style.STYLE_SN where pano_project_style.SN=#style_sn#

SELECT pano_project_package.`NAME`, pano_project_package.SN, pano_project_package.IMG_SN FROM pano_project_house_style INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_house_package.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = pano_project_house_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house ON pano_project_house_style.HOUSE_SN = pano_project_house.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package ON pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_package.SN where pano_project_house.SN=#house_sn#
SELECT pano_mem_user.SN, pano_mem_user.NICK_NAME, pano_mem_user.MOBILE, pano_mem_user.EMAIL, pano_mem_user.CITY FROM pano_mem_user where pano_mem_user.MOBILE=#phone#

SELECT pano_project_package_type.SN, pano_project_package_type.`NAME`, pano_project_house_style.SN house_style_sn FROM pano_project_package INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package ON pano_project_house_package.PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_package.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_package_type ON pano_project_package_type.HOUSE_PACKAGE_SN = pano_project_house_package.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_house_style ON pano_project_house_package.HOUSE_STYLE_SN = pano_project_house_style.SN where pano_project_house_package.SN=#house_package_sn#
SELECT pano_project_package.SN, pano_project_package.`NAME`, pano_project_package.IMG_SN FROM pano_project_package where pano_project_package.SN=#package_sn#
